# eth-keystore-rs

[<img alt="crates.io" src="https://img.shields.io/crates/v/eth-keystore.svg?style=for-the-badge&color=fc8d62&logo=rust" height="20">](https://crates.io/crates/eth-keystore)
[<img alt="docs.rs" src="https://img.shields.io/docsrs/eth-keystore/latest?color=66c2a5&label=docs-rs&logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%&style=for-the-badge" height="20">](https://docs.rs/eth-keystore/0.4.1/eth_keystore/)
[<img alt="build status" src="https://img.shields.io/github/workflow/status/roynalnaruto/eth-keystore-rs/Rust/master?style=for-the-badge" height="20">](https://github.com/roynalnaruto/eth-keystore-rs/actions?query=branch%3Amaster)

A minimalist library to interact with encrypted JSON keystores as per the [Web3 Secret Storage Definition](https://github.com/ethereum/wiki/wiki/Web3-Secret-Storage-Definition).
